channel.title: american on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in american on Recipes

item.title: Breakfast_sandwhiches
item.description: Ingredients 1 bagel, toasted or grilled 1 egg, over easy or sunny side upâ€¦or if you must: scrambled 1 slice American cheese (or whatever works for you) 2 tablespoons Bacon & Onion Jam, see recipe 2 sliced crispy bacon 1 tablespoon mayo 1/2 tablespoon mustard Directions Add Bacon Jam to bottom bagel While egg is cooking, add cheese so it can start melting Add mayo & mustard to top bagel

item.title: Fastfood_burgers
item.description: Ingredients: Ground Beef (80/20) Salt Pepper Avocado Oil Lettuce Tomato Hamburger Buns Ketchup Mustard Frank’s red hot sauce American Cheese Instructions: Preheat your grill or stovetop grill pan to medium-high heat. You want it nice and hot so the burgers get a good sear. Divide the ground beef into 4 equal portions and shape into patties. Sprinkle each patty with a little bit of salt and pepper on both sides.
